Sentencas: In order to improve the performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), there is a need to deepen our understanding of the cathode reactions, which is rate-limiting.
Titulo: Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width

Sentencas: The purpose of this work is to develop and demonstrate a direct electrochemical technique for estimating the cathode triple-phase boundary (TPB) between electrode, electrolyte and gas phase.
Titulo: Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width

Sentencas: Interdigitated gold micro-electrodes are fabricated on YSZ for this purpose as gold is oxygen-blocking, forcing the oxygen to enter into the solid electrolyte at the TPB.
Titulo: Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width

Sentencas: Three-electrode measurements are performed, allowing ac impedance measurement between two interdigitated gold electrodes while at the same time driving dc current between one of the gold electrodes and a silver counter electrode.
Titulo: Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy (IS) measurements are performed at 300 degrees C. IS results demonstrate two main features a large low-frequency (LF) arc and a smaller high-frequency (HF) arc, which actually consists of two overlapping arcs.
Titulo: Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width

Sentencas: The results suggest that the HF arc reflects mainly the surface impedance between the opposing TPBs and that the TPB width is much less than 8 mu m and estimated to be at most 1 mu m. The TPB width increases under high anodic polarization.
Titulo: Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width

Sentencas: The LF arc reflects the electrode impedance.
Titulo: Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width
Novel method for determining the triple phase boundary width
